trans-unit.target: 。从IPython 5.0版开始，此进度条将在IPython和Jupyter笔记本中自动激活。（＃1087， ＃1375）

. Target points can be passed directly to the

trans-unit.source: 100 LIF neurons representing a sine wave
2.0.2 is a bug fix release to ensure that Nengo continues to work with more recent versions of Jupyter (formerly known as the IPython notebook).
trans-unit.target: 2.0.2是一个bug修复版本,以确保Nengo能够继续与最新版本的Jupyter(以前称为IPython笔记本)一起工作。

trans-unit.source: A new class for representing stateful functions called
trans-unit.target: 一个用于表示有状态函数的新类,称为

trans-unit.source: A progress bar now tracks the build process in the terminal and Jupyter notebook. (#937, #1151)
trans-unit.target: 现在，进度条将跟踪终端和Jupyter笔记本中的构建过程。（＃937， ＃1151）

trans-unit.source: A summary of the principles underlying all of these examples
trans-unit.target: 对所有这些例子所依据的原则进行总结。

trans-unit.source: A version of the AssociativeMemory SPA module is now available as a stand-alone network in
trans-unit.target: AssociativeMemory SPA模块的一个版本现在可以作为一个独立的网络来使用。
通过以下方式访问测头数据

trans-unit.source: Added SPA wrapper for circular convolution networks,
trans-unit.target: 增加了循环卷积网络的SPA包装器。

trans-unit.source: Added a bit precision setting to change the number of bits allocated to each value tracked by Nengo. (#640)
trans-unit.target: 添加了位精度设置，以更改分配给Nengo跟踪的每个值的位数。（＃640）

trans-unit.source: Added a clipped exponential distribution useful for thresholding, in particular in the AssociativeMemory. (#779)
trans-unit.target: 添加了裁剪的指数分布，可用于阈值设置，尤其是在AssociativeMemory中。（＃779）

trans-unit.source: Added a cosine similarity distribution, which is the distribution of the cosine of the angle between two random vectors. It is useful for setting intercepts, in particular when using the
trans-unit.target: 增加了余弦相似度分布,即两个随机向量之间角度的余弦分布。它对于设置截距很有用,特别是在使用

trans-unit.source: Added a method to all neuron types to compute ensemble
trans-unit.target: 为所有神经元类型添加了一种方法,以计算合集

trans-unit.source: Added a minimum magnitude option to
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个最小幅度选项到

trans-unit.source: Added a new example showing how adjusting ensemble tuning curves can improve function approximation. (#1129)
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个新示例，该示例显示了如何调整集成调音曲线可以改善函数逼近。（＃1129）

trans-unit.source: Added a page explaining the config system and preset configs. (#1150)
trans-unit.target: 添加了说明配置系统和预设配置的页面。（＃1150）

trans-unit.source: Added a registry system so that only stable objects are cached. (#1054, #1068)
trans-unit.target: 添加了注册表系统，以便仅缓存稳定的对象。（＃1054， ＃1068）
设置时增加了一个警告

trans-unit.source: Added an optimizer that reduces simulation time for common types of models. The optimizer can be turned off by passing
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个优化器,可以减少常见类型模型的模拟时间。优化器可以通过传递
添加了有关RC设置的文档。（＃1130）

trans-unit.source: Added documentation on config system quirks. (#1224)
trans-unit.target: 添加了有关配置系统怪癖的文档。（＃1224）
添加了有关提高性能的文档。（＃1119， ＃1130）

trans-unit.source: Added more content to the API reference documentation. (#1578)
trans-unit.target: 在API参考文档中添加了更多内容。（＃1578）
增加了新的 pytest 配置选项。

trans-unit.source: Added progress bar support for Jupyter Lab >=0.32. (#1428, #1087)
trans-unit.target: 添加了对Jupyter Lab> = 0.32的进度条支持。（＃1428， ＃1087）
添加了对卷积连接的支持。（＃1481）
添加了对稀疏连接的支持。（＃1532）

trans-unit.source: Added the option to not normalize encoders by setting
trans-unit.target: 添加了不规范化编码器的选项,通过设置

trans-unit.source: Added version tracking to documentation, so that documentation from old versions remains available. (#1488)
trans-unit.target: 在文档中添加了版本跟踪功能，因此旧版本的文档仍然可用。（＃1488）
允许重复出现以下形式

trans-unit.source: An exception is raised if SPA modules are not properly assigned to an SPA attribute. (#730, #791)
trans-unit.target: 如果未将SPA模块正确分配给SPA属性，则会引发异常。（＃730， ＃791）

trans-unit.source: Better error message for invalid return values in
trans-unit.target: 中无效返回值的错误信息更好

trans-unit.source: Better error message when Node output function does not match the given
trans-unit.target: 当Node输出函数与给定的函数不匹配时,更好的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Cache now fails gracefully if the
Computing the square across a neural connection
trans-unit.target: 计算跨越神经连接的平方

trans-unit.source: Connection weights can now be probed with
Controlled oscillatory dynamics with a recurrent connection
trans-unit.target: 循环连接的受控振荡动力学

trans-unit.source: Default values can no longer be set for
trans-unit.target: 不能再为以下项目设置默认值

trans-unit.source: Dense connection transforms (this includes all previously supported values for
trans-unit.target: 密集连接变换 (这包括之前支持的所有值)

trans-unit.source: Documentation pages that had underscores in their filenames have been renamed to have hyphens instead. (#1585)
trans-unit.target: 文件名中带有下划线的文档页面已被重命名为带有连字符。（＃1585）

trans-unit.source: Documentation that applies to all Nengo projects has been moved to https://www.nengo.ai/. (#1251)
trans-unit.target: 适用于所有Nengo项目的文档已移至 https://www.nengo.ai/。（＃1251）

trans-unit.source: Dropped support for NumPy 1.6. Oldest supported NumPy version is now 1.7. (#1147)
trans-unit.target: 不再支持NumPy 1.6。支持的最旧的NumPy版本现在是1.7。（＃1147）

trans-unit.source: Eliminate memory leak in the parameter system. (#1089, #1090)
trans-unit.target: 消除参数系统中的内存泄漏。（＃1089， ＃1090）

trans-unit.source: Example Jupyter notebooks have been upgraded to notebook format 4. (#1440)
trans-unit.target: 示例Jupyter笔记本已升级到笔记本格式4。（＃1440）

trans-unit.source: Fix compatibility issues with newer versions of IPython, and Jupyter. (#693)
trans-unit.target: 修复了较新版本的IPython和Jupyter的兼容性问题。（＃693）

trans-unit.source: Fix for SPA actions that route to a module with multiple inputs. (#714)
trans-unit.target: 修复了路由到具有多个输入的模块的SPA操作。（＃714）

trans-unit.source: Fixed a crash when a lock cannot be acquired while shrinking the cache. (#1335, #1336)
trans-unit.target: 修复了在缩小缓存时无法获取锁定的崩溃。（＃1335， ＃1336）

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which Nengo would crash if other programs had locks on Nengo cache files in Windows. (#1200, #1235)
trans-unit.target: 修复了Windows中Nengo缓存文件被其他程序锁定时Nengo崩溃的问题。（＃1200， ＃1235）

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which SPA models could not be copied. (#1266, #1271)
trans-unit.target: 修复了无法复制SPA模型的问题。（＃1266， ＃1271）

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which accepting and passing
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个问题,在接受和传递

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which multiple identical indices in a slice were ignored. (#947, #1361)
trans-unit.target: 修复了片中多个相同索引被忽略的问题。（＃947， ＃1361）

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which probing some attributes would be one timestep faster than other attributes. (#1234, #1245)
trans-unit.target: 修复了探测某些属性比其他属性快一个时间步的问题。（＃1234， ＃1245）

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which reshaped signals were not having their offset values preserved, causing issues with some node functions. (#1474)
trans-unit.target: 修复了未保留改形信号的偏移值而导致某些节点功能出现问题的问题。（＃1474）

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which signals could not be pickled, making it impossible to pickle
trans-unit.target: 修正了信号无法腌制的问题,使得无法腌制。

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which the PES learning rule could not be used on connections to an
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个问题,即PES学习规则不能用于连接到一个叫 "D "的人。

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue in which the cache would not release its index lock on abnormal termination of the Nengo process. (#1364)
trans-unit.target: 修复了Nengo进程异常终止时缓存不会释放其索引锁的问题。（＃1364）

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue with repeated elements in slices in which a positive and negative index referred to the same dimension. (#1395)
trans-unit.target: 修复了切片中重复元素的正索引和负索引引用相同维度的问题。（＃1395）

trans-unit.source: Fixed error when using advanced indexing to connect to an
trans-unit.target: 修正了当使用高级索引连接到一个

trans-unit.source: Fixed instances in which passing a callable class as a function could fail. (#1245)
trans-unit.target: 修复了将可调用类作为函数传递时可能失败的实例。（＃1245）

trans-unit.source: Fixed issue in which learning connections could not be sliced. (#632)
trans-unit.target: 解决了无法分割学习联系的问题。（＃632）

trans-unit.source: Fixed issue when probing scalar transforms. (#667, #671)
trans-unit.target: 修复了探测标量变换时的问题。（＃667， ＃671）

trans-unit.source: Fixed some situations where the cache index becomes corrupt by writing the updated cache index atomically (in most cases). (#1097, #1107)
trans-unit.target: 修复了某些情况下，通过原子写入更新的缓存索引（大多数情况下）会损坏缓存索引的情况。（＃1097， ＃1107）

trans-unit.source: Fixed the progress bar in recent Jupyter Lab versions. (#1499, #1500)
trans-unit.target: 修复了Jupyter Lab最新版本中的进度条。（＃1499， ＃1500）

trans-unit.source: Fixed thread-safety of using networks and config in
trans-unit.target: 修正了在网络和配置中使用线程的安全性。

trans-unit.source: Fixed validation checks that prevented the default from being set on certain parameters. (#1372)
trans-unit.target: 固定的验证检查，防止在某些参数上设置默认值。（＃1372）

trans-unit.source: Here are six of many examples showing how Nengo enables the creation and simulation of large-scale neural models in few lines of code.
trans-unit.target: 以下是许多示例中的六个， 这些示例 显示Nengo如何在几行代码中实现大规模神经模型的创建和仿真。

trans-unit.source: If the cache index is corrupted, we now fail gracefully by invalidating the cache and continuing rather than raising an exception. (#1110, #1097)
trans-unit.target: 如果缓存索引已损坏，我们现在将通过使缓存无效并继续而不是引发异常来正常地失败。（＃1110， ＃1097）

trans-unit.source: If the simulator seed is not specified, it will now be set from the network seed if a network seed is specified. (#980, #1386)
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定模拟器种子，则现在如果指定了网络种子，则可以从网络种子中进行设置。（＃980， ＃1386）

trans-unit.source: If you have difficulty installing Nengo or NumPy, please read the more detailed Nengo installation instructions first.
trans-unit.target: 如果您在安装Nengo或NumPy时遇到困难，请先阅读更详细的 Nengo安装说明。

trans-unit.source: If you’d like to install Nengo from source, please read the developer installation instructions.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想从源代码安装Nengo，请阅读开发人员安装说明。

trans-unit.source: Improved performance of the decoder cache by writing all decoders of a network into a single file. (#946)
trans-unit.target: 通过将网络的所有解码器写入单个文件来提高解码器缓存的性能。（＃946）

trans-unit.source: Increased minimum NumPy version to 1.11.0. See our instructions for installing NumPy if you need to upgrade. (#1481)
trans-unit.target: 将最低NumPy版本增加到1.11.0。 如果需要升级，请参阅我们的 NumPy安装说明。（＃1481）

trans-unit.source: Information for current or prospective developers can be found at https://www.nengo.ai/contributing/.
trans-unit.target: 有关当前或潜在开发人员的信息，请访问https://www.nengo.ai/contributing/。

trans-unit.source: Initial release of Nengo 2.0! Supports Python 2.6+ and 3.3+. Thanks to all of the contributors for making this possible!
trans-unit.target: Nengo 2.0的初始版本! 支持Python 2.6+和3.3+。感谢所有的贡献者,使之成为可能!

trans-unit.source: Integer indexing of Nengo objects out of range raises an
trans-unit.target: Nengo对象的整数索引超出范围会引起一个

trans-unit.source: It is now possible to pass NumPy arrays in the
It is now possible to pass a NumPy array to the
trans-unit.target: 现在可以将一个NumPy数组传递给

trans-unit.source: It is now possible to probe
Learning a communication channel with the PES rule
Learning rules can now be sliced when providing error input. (#1365, #1385)
trans-unit.target: 提供错误输入时，现在可以对学习规则进行切片。（＃1365， ＃1385）

trans-unit.source: Learning rules can now have a learning rate of 0. (#1356)
trans-unit.target: 学习规则现在的学习率为0。（＃1356）

trans-unit.source: Most exceptions that Nengo can raise are now custom exception classes that can be found in the
trans-unit.target: 大多数Nengo可以引发的异常现在都是自定义的异常类,可以在

trans-unit.source: Nengo depends on NumPy, and we recommend that you install NumPy before installing Nengo. If you’re not sure how to do this, we recommend using Anaconda.
trans-unit.target: Nengo取决于NumPy，我们建议您在安装Nengo之前先安装NumPy。如果您不确定如何执行此操作，建议您使用 Anaconda。

trans-unit.source: Nengo is a Python library for building and simulating large-scale neural models. Nengo can create sophisticated spiking and non-spiking neural simulations with sensible defaults in a few lines of code. Yet, Nengo is highly extensible and flexible. You can define your own neuron types and learning rules, get input directly from hardware, build and run deep neural networks, drive robots, and even simulate your model on a completely different neural simulator or neuromorphic hardware.
trans-unit.target: Nengo是一个用于构建和模拟大规模神经模型的Python库。Nengo只需几行代码就可以创建复杂的尖峰和非尖峰神经模拟,并提供合理的默认值。然而,Nengo具有高度的可扩展性和灵活性。您可以定义自己的神经元类型和学习规则,直接从硬件中获取输入,构建并运行深度神经网络,驱动机器人,甚至可以在一个完全不同的神经模拟器或神经形态硬件上模拟您的模型。

trans-unit.source: Nengo is tested to work on Python 3.5 and above. Python 2.7 and Python 3.4 were supported up to and including Nengo 2.8.0.
trans-unit.target: 经测试,Nengo可在Python 3.5及以上版本中使用。支持Python 2.7和Python 3.4,直到并包括Nengo 2.8.0。

trans-unit.source: Nengo no longer supports Python 3.4. Official 3.4 support ended in March 2019. (PEP-429, #1514)
trans-unit.target: Nengo不再支持Python 3.4。官方3.4支持已于2019年3月结束。（PEP-429， ＃1514）

trans-unit.source: Nengo: Large-scale brain modelling in Python
trans-unit.target: Nengo:用Python进行大规模的大脑建模

trans-unit.source: Neural gains are now always applied after the synapse model. Previously, this was the case for decoded connections but not neuron-to-neuron connections. (#1330)
trans-unit.target: 现在总是在突触模型之后应用神经增益。以前，解码连接是这种情况，但神经元到神经元的连接则不是这种情况。（＃1330）

trans-unit.source: Nodes now support array views as input. (#1156, #1157)
trans-unit.target: 节点现在支持将数组视图作为输入。（＃1156， ＃1157）

trans-unit.source: Numpy arrays can now be used as indices for slicing objects. (#754)
trans-unit.target: 现在可以将Numpy数组用作切片对象的索引。（＃754）

trans-unit.source: PES learning updates are now applied on the next timestep rather than the current one. (#1398)
trans-unit.target: PES学习更新现在应用于下一个时间步，而不是当前时间步。（＃1398）

trans-unit.source: Probe cache is now cleared on simulator reset. (#1324)
trans-unit.target: 现在，在模拟器复位时清除探针缓存。（＃1324）

trans-unit.source: Probing a Connection’s output now returns the output of that individual Connection, rather than the input to the Connection’s post Ensemble. (#973, #974)
trans-unit.target: 现在，探查一个Connection的输出将返回该单个Connection的输出，而不是Connection的post Ensemble的输入。（＃973， ＃974）

trans-unit.source: Processes with internal state now declare that state by defining a
trans-unit.target: 具有内部状态的进程现在通过定义一个叫做

trans-unit.source: Properly handle non C-contiguous node outputs. (#1184, #1185)
trans-unit.target: 正确处理非C连续的节点输出。（＃1184， ＃1185）

trans-unit.source: Python 2 is no longer supported. The oldest supported Python version is 3.5. (#1520, python3statement.org)
trans-unit.target: 不再支持Python 2。支持的最早的Python版本是3.5。（＃1520， python3statement.org）

trans-unit.source: Questions relating to Nengo, whether it’s use or it’s development, should be asked on the Nengo forum at https://forum.nengo.ai.
trans-unit.target: 有关Nengo的问题，无论是使用还是开发，都应在Nengo论坛（https://forum.nengo.ai）上提问。

trans-unit.source: Removed functions for estimating firing rates from spikes. They can now be found in nengo_extras. (#1187)
trans-unit.target: 删除了用于估计尖峰脉冲发射速率的功能。现在可以在nengo_extras中找到它们。（＃1187）

trans-unit.source: Removed support for legacy cache files. (#1577)
trans-unit.target: 删除了对旧缓存文件的支持。（＃1577）

trans-unit.source: Removed the Python 2 compatibility code from
Removed the nengo ipynb progress bar extension. This is no longer needed in more recent ipynb versions. (#1577)
trans-unit.target: 删除了nengo ipynb进度栏扩展。在最新的ipynb版本中不再需要此功能。（＃1577）

trans-unit.source: Reorganised the Associative Memory code, including removing many extra parameters from
trans-unit.target: 重组了关联内存代码,包括删除了许多额外的参数。

trans-unit.source: Resetting the Simulator now resets all Processes, meaning the injected random signals and noise are identical between runs, unless the seed is changed (which can be done through
trans-unit.target: 重置模拟器现在可以重置所有的进程,这意味着注入的随机信号和噪声在运行之间是相同的,除非改变了种子(这可以通过

trans-unit.source: Running the simulator for zero timesteps will now issue a warning, and running for negative time will error. (#1354, #1357)
trans-unit.target: 现在，以零时间步长运行模拟器将发出警告，而以负时间运行时将出错。（＃1354， ＃1357）

trans-unit.source: Several objects had elements missing from their string representations. These strings are now automatically generated and tested to be complete. (#1472)
trans-unit.target: 一些对象的字符串表示形式缺少元素。这些字符串现在会自动生成并测试为完整。（＃1472）

trans-unit.source: Simple question answering with the Semantic Pointer Architecture
trans-unit.target: 用语义指针架构简单答题

trans-unit.source: Solvers are now explicitly marked as compositional or non-compositional depending on whether they must act on full connection weight matrices when solving for weights. (#1507)
trans-unit.target: 现在，求解器根据求解权重时是否必须对完整连接权重矩阵起作用而明确标记为组成或非组成。（＃1507）

trans-unit.source: Solvers no longer take encoders as an argument. Instead, encoders will be applied to the targets before the solve function for non-compositional solvers and applied by the Transform builder for compositional solvers. (#1507)
trans-unit.target: 解算器不再将编码器作为参数。取而代之的是，编码器将在非复合求解器的求解函数之前应用于目标，而由“变换”构建器应用于复合求解器。（＃1507）

trans-unit.source: Support a greater range of Jupyter notebook and ipywidgets versions with the the
trans-unit.target: 支持更多的Jupyter笔记本和ipywidgets版本。

trans-unit.source: Switched to nengo-bones templating system for TravisCI config/scripts. (#1514)
trans-unit.target: 切换到TravisCI配置/脚本的nengo-bones模板系统。（＃1514）

trans-unit.source: The Nengo modelling API document now has summaries to help navigate the page. (#1304)
trans-unit.target: 该Nengo建模API文档 现在已经汇总可帮助浏览页面。（＃1304）

trans-unit.source: The DecoderCache is now more robust when used improperly, and no longer requires changes to backends in order to use properly. (#1112)
trans-unit.target: 现在，如果使用不当，DecoderCache会更健壮，并且不再需要更改后端即可正常使用。（＃1112）

trans-unit.source: The DecoderCache is used as context manager instead of relying on the
trans-unit.target: DecoderCache被用作上下文管理器,而不是依靠于

trans-unit.source: The IPython notebook progress bar has to be activated with
trans-unit.target: IPython 笔记本进度条必须通过以下方式激活

trans-unit.source: The SPA Compare module produces a scalar output (instead of a specific vector). (#775, #782)
trans-unit.target: SPA Compare模块产生标量输出（而不是特定矢量）。（＃775， ＃782）

trans-unit.source: The builder will now raise an error if any encoders are NaN, which can occur if an encoder has length zero. (#1571)
trans-unit.target: 现在，如果任何编码器为NaN，则构建器将引发错误，如果编码器的长度为零，则可能会发生此错误。（＃1571）

trans-unit.source: The decoder cache will only be used when a seed is specified. (#946)
trans-unit.target: 仅在指定种子时才使用解码器缓存。（＃946）

trans-unit.source: The matrix multiplication example will now work with matrices of any size and uses the product network for clarity. (#1159)
trans-unit.target: 矩阵乘法示例现在可以与任何大小的矩阵一起使用，并且为了清楚起见，使用乘积网络。（＃1159）

trans-unit.source: The minimum required version of NumPy has been raised to 1.8. (#947)
trans-unit.target: NumPy的最低要求版本已提高到1.8。（＃947）

trans-unit.source: The order of parameters in learning rules has changed such that
trans-unit.target: 学习规则中的参数顺序发生了变化,以致于

trans-unit.source: The progress bar that can appear when building a large model will now appear earlier in the build process. (#1340)
trans-unit.target: 现在，在构建大型模型时出现的进度条将在构建过程的早期显示。（＃1340）

trans-unit.source: This requires Pandoc to be installed, as well as some additional Python packages. For more details, see the Developer Guide.
trans-unit.target: 这需要安装Pandoc以及一些其他Python软件包。有关更多详细信息，请参见《开发人员指南》。

trans-unit.source: To build the documentation yourself, run the following command:
trans-unit.target: 要自己建立文档,请运行以下命令。

trans-unit.source: Tools for building and simulating large-scale neural models
trans-unit.target: 构建和模拟大规模神经模型的工具。

trans-unit.source: Usage and API documentation can be found at https://www.nengo.ai/nengo/.
trans-unit.target: 用法和API文档可在https://www.nengo.ai/nengo/中找到 。

trans-unit.target: 我们现在提出一个错误,当一个

trans-unit.source: We now raise an error when an ensemble is assigned a negative gain. This can occur when solving for gains with intercepts greater than 1. (#1212, #1231, #1248)
trans-unit.target: 现在，当给整体分配负增益时，我们会产生一个错误。在求解截距大于1的增益时可能会发生这种情况。（＃1212， ＃1231， ＃1248）

trans-unit.source: We now warn that the progress bar is not supported in Jupyter Notebook <5. (#1428, #1426)
trans-unit.target: 现在，我们警告Jupyter Notebook <5不支持进度条。（＃1428， ＃1426）

trans-unit.source: now use the initial value of the input signal to initialize the filter output by default. This provides more accurate filtering at the beginning of the signal, for signals that do not start at zero. (#945)

trans-unit.source: now uses state space representations internally, which is faster and potentially more accurate. (#1535)

trans-unit.source: rule’s learning rate is invariant to the number of neurons in the presynaptic population. The effective speed of learning should now be unaffected by changes in the size of the presynaptic population. Existing learning networks may need to be updated; to achieve identical behavior, scale the learning rate by
trans-unit.target: 规则的学习率与突触前群体中的神经元数量无关。现在，学习的有效速度应不受突触前人群大小变化的影响。现有的学习网络可能需要更新；要达到相同的行为，通过
设置在首次将运算符添加到模型时对其进行测试。有关 详细信息，请参见配置选项。（＃1532）

trans-unit.source: so that spikes from different neurons don’t overlap. (#1121)
trans-unit.target: 这样来自不同神经元的尖峰不会重叠。（＃1121）

trans-unit.source: solver is improved since we clip values to be non-negative before forming the Gram system. (#1027, #1019)
trans-unit.target: 由于我们在形成Gram系统之前将值裁剪为非负值，因此改进了求解器。（＃1027， ＃1019）

trans-unit.source: solver now works for weights. The
trans-unit.target: 求解器现在可以用于权重。该

trans-unit.source: solver that can be used to manually pass in a predefined set of decoders or weights to a connection. (#1352)
trans-unit.target: 可用于手动将一组预定义的解码器或权重传递给连接的求解器。（＃1352）

trans-unit.source: subsolver for the L2 solvers. This can be much quicker for large numbers of neurons or evaluation points. (#803)
trans-unit.target: L2求解器的subsolver。对于大量的神经元或评估点，这可能要快得多。（＃803）

trans-unit.source: synapse, which filters with a triangular FIR filter. (#660)
trans-unit.target: 突触，使用三角FIR滤波器进行滤波。（＃660）

trans-unit.source: synapses had unnecessary delays that have now been removed. (#1535)
trans-unit.target: 突触具有不必要的延迟，现已消除。（＃1535）

trans-unit.source: through the constructor had no effect. (#724)
trans-unit.target: 通过构造函数没有效果。（＃724）

trans-unit.source: to accept Semantic Pointer expressions as
trans-unit.target: 以接受语义指针表达式作为

trans-unit.source: to avoid high gains when intercepts are close to 1. (#1534, #1561)
trans-unit.target: 避免在截距接近1时获得高收益。（＃1534， ＃1561）

trans-unit.source: used to provide access to and is the canonical way to access this data across different backends. (#1145, #1173)
trans-unit.target: 用于提供访问权限，并且是跨不同后端访问此数据的规范方法。（＃1145， ＃1173）

trans-unit.source: utility function now takes a string
trans-unit.target: 工具函数现在接受一个字符串

trans-unit.source: utility function. It can now be found in nengo_extras. (#1187)
trans-unit.target: 实用功能。现在可以在nengo_extras中找到 它。（＃1187）

trans-unit.source: values, and they will be automatically converted to the equivalent
trans-unit.target: 值,它们将被自动转换为等价的

trans-unit.source: will be removed in the next minor release. (#1520)
trans-unit.target: 将在下一个次要版本中删除。（＃1520）

trans-unit.source: will now raise an error if their initial value contains NaNs. (#1571)
trans-unit.target: 如果它们的初始值包含NaN，则现在将引发错误。（＃1571）

trans-unit.source: works with 0 neurons, and generates much smaller PDFs. (#601)
trans-unit.target: 使用0个神经元，并生成更小的PDF。（＃601）

trans-unit.source: would return values that the simulator had not simulated.
trans-unit.target: 会返回模拟器没有模拟过的值。

trans-unit.source: you are always specifying the values for the decoders, and encoders/transform will be applied automatically to those decoders (as occurs with all other solvers). Note that this does not affect
trans-unit.target: 您总是指定解码器的值,编码器/变换将自动应用于这些解码器(与所有其他解算器一样)。请注意,这不会影响
